participant_abstract.sent: In the last meeting we made important decisions about design issues.
We decided which materials we wanted to use, which functionalities to include, once more spoke about the market trends and what is 'in' at the moment.
As far as interface design issues are concerned, things have become much clearer.
We are going to have buttons for major functions that enable fast action, and an LCD and a spinning wheel to access more options.
